bibl.title: Sixty-Five Papyrological Texts Presented to Klaas A. Worp on the Occasion of his 65th Birthday
bibl.note: P. Worp 1-65. - Pp. v-vi: F.A.J.H. and B.P.M., Preface; - xiii-xxxiii: Bibliography of Klaas A. Worp. - Greek and Coptic Literary Texts (1-5). - Greek and Latin Subliterary Texts (6-11). - Demotic Documentary Texts (12). - Greek Documentary Papyri (13-37). - Greek Documentary Ostraca (38-61). - Coptic Documentary Texts (62-64). - Arabic Documentary Texts (65).
bibl.seg: HOOGENDIJK F.A.J. and B.P. MUHS (Edd.), Sixty-Five Papyrological Texts Presented to Klaas A. Worp on the Occasion of his 65th Birthday. With Indexes by M.J. BAKKER. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXIII.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2008, 4°, xl-416 pp., 1 portrait, figg. ISBN 978-90-04-16688-2. €146.

P. Worp 1-65. - Pp. v-vi: F.A.J.H. and B.P.M., Preface; - xiii-xxxiii: Bibliography of Klaas A. Worp. - Greek and Coptic Literary Texts (1-5). - Greek and Latin Subliterary Texts (6-11). - Demotic Documentary Texts (12). - Greek Documentary Papyri (13-37). - Greek Documentary Ostraca (38-61). - Coptic Documentary Texts (62-64). - Arabic Documentary Texts (65).

C.R. par Georges Nachtergael †, ChrEg 84 (2009) Nos 167-168, pp. 360-365. - Peter van Minnen, BASP 46 (2009) pp. 199-207. - Amin Benaissa, CR N.S., 60 (2010) pp. 413-415. - Daniela Colomo, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2010/2010-07-04.html >.
